components.editSignup.delete.info1: Are you sure you want to delete your sign up to <1>{{event}}</1>?
components.editSignup.delete.info2: If you delete your signup you will lose your spot in the queue. If you change your mind you can always sign up again to the event later, but you will be moved to the end of the queue.
components.editSignup.editInstructions.email: The link will also be included in the confirmation email.
components.editSignup.editInstructions: You can edit or delete your signup later by saving the URL of this page.
components.editSignup.loadError.BadEditToken.title: Invalid verification token
components.editSignup.loadError.BadEditToken.descri: The verification token in the URL is incorrect. Please verify that you typed the URL correctly.
components.editSignup.loadError.404.title: Signup not found
components.editSignup.loadError.404.description: Your signup was not found. It might be already deleted, or you might have mistyped the URL.
components.editSignup.loadError.default.description: Your signup could not be loaded.
components.editSignup.errors.closed: Your signup cannot be changed anymore as the signup for the event has closed.
components.editSignup.namePublic: Show name in public signup list
components.editSignup.position.openQuota: You are in the open quota in position {{position}}.
components.editSignup.position.queue: You are in the queue in position {{position}}.
components.editSignup.position.quota: You are in quota {{quota}} in position {{position}}.
components.editSignup.publicQuestion: Answers to this field are public.
components.editSignup.deleteError.SignupsClosed.des: The signup for this event has closed, so your signup could no longer be deleted.
components.editSignup.deleteError.NoSuchSignup.desc: Your signup has already been deleted.
components.editSignup.editError.SignupsClosed.descr: The signup for this event has closed, so your changes could no longer be saved.
components.editSignup.editError.NoSuchSignup.descri: Your signup was not found. It might be already deleted.
components.editSignup.editError.400.description: Editing failed. Make sure you have filled all mandatory fields and try again.
components.editSignup.signupError.SignupsClosed.des: The signup for this event has closed, so your signup could no longer be saved.
components.editSignup.signupError.NoSuchSignup.desc: Your signup was not found. It might be already deleted.
components.editSignup.signupError.400.description: Signup failed. Make sure you have filled all mandatory fields and try again.
components.errors.contactAdmin: If the problem persists, please report it to the administrators.
components.errors.default.title: Whoops, something went wrong
components.errors.500.description: An internal error occurred on the server. $t(errors.contactAdmin)
components.errors.502.description: The backend server seems to be down. $t(errors.contactAdmin)
components.errors.503.description: The backend server seems to be down. $t(errors.contactAdmin)
components.errors.504.description: The backend server seems to be unresponsive. $t(errors.contactAdmin)
